</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Create a custom radio channel with the given color, label, call sign and registered characters. The '''[[Channel IDs|custom channel ID]]''' returned can be used to manipulate the created channel later. There are 10 slots for custom radio channels which would correspond to channels 6-15 (see [[getPlayerChannel]]). The command will find an unused index in this range and create it when found. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[radioChannelCreate]] [color, label, callSign, units, sentenceType] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] - RGBA color values </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> label: [[String]] - label </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> callSign: [[String]] - call sign </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> units: [[Array]] - list of units in the channel </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> sentenceType (Optional): [[Boolean]] (Default: [[true]]) 
* [[true]] - use ''Protocol'' message color from <tt>[[getArray]] ([[configFile]] >> "RscChatListDefault" >> "colorMessageProtocol")</tt>
* [[false]] - use ''Normal'' message color from <tt>[[getArray]] ([[configFile]] >> "RscChatListDefault" >> "colorMessage")</tt> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - created '''[[Channel IDs|custom channel ID]]''' (used in [[customChat]] command), 0 if failed </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

	[[private]] _channelName = "Q-dance Radio";
	[[private]] _channelID = [[radioChannelCreate]] [[0.96, 0.34, 0.13, 0.8], _channelName, "%UNIT_NAME", []];
	[[if]] (_channelID == 0) [[exitWith]] {[[diag_log]] [[format]] ["Custom channel '%1' creation failed!", _channelName]};
